pkgmetadata.longdescription: A program implementing the Milter API that signs and verifies using the DKIM standard. This is a fork of Sendmail's DKIM-milter

use.flag: Include features like stats, querycache, popauth, report intervals and bodylengthdb that include berkdb
On verification failure, compare the original and the received headers to look for possible munging
Use inbuilt asynchronous DNS library for queries
Allow addition of multiple signatures when key lists are in use.
